concept.title: Lift Pump and Lift Pump Motor

note.p: High-pressure fluid can go through the skin and cause injury.

High-pressure fluid that goes into the skin is a medical emergency. There is a delayed start of pain, and severe tissue damage may occur. Seek medical aid from a specialist who has had experience with this type of injury.

ul.li: Release the pressure before you disconnect the hydraulic lines.
Tighten all connections before you apply the pressure.
Keep your hands and body away from pin-holes which eject high-pressure fluids.
Use a piece of cardboard or paper to examine for leaks. Do not use your hand
